item.description:
Merry Christmas! Now let's burn off those sugar cookies.

New hiking gear?, snowshoes? Skis? or maybe you would just like to get the family out to play in the snow.

Weather permitting, I want to test out my X skis and new boots on these wonderful ski trails here and maybe you would like to come too!

Hikers can meet earlier, but its a sleep in day for me and a few hours of skiing will be enough. With mixed activities, We can set an end time of 3:30pm and head over to the Irish pub/restaurant and celebrate.
item.how_to_find_us: Gold Honda CRV phone 603-477-5116 Meet in the lodge entrance
item.name: Mt Cardigan Hike or Ski
